.table mother
----


.table father
----


matGramp{child: A, grandfather: C} :-
  mother{child: A, mother: B} & father{child: B, father: C}.
----


father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}.
----
1right: father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}

mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
----
1left: mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}
0: father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}
matGramp: father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}
